blogPost.excerpt: Sniffly is a virtual rehab program for people who have lost their sense of smell and taste from COVID-19. The program includes smell training exercises that are compiled by medical professionals and a smell diary for self-assessment.
blogPost.body: Sniffly is a virtual rehab program for people who have lost their sense of smell and taste from COVID-19. The program includes smell training exercises that are compiled by medical professionals and a smell diary for self-assessment.
blogPost.title: Sniffly - Regain your smell & taste after COVID-19
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Snifflyは、COVID-19で嗅覚や味覚を失った人のためのバーチャル・リハビリ・プログラムです。プログラムには、医療関係者がまとめた嗅覚トレーニングのエクササイズや、自己評価のための嗅覚ダイアリーが含まれています。
localize.tagline: COVID-19の後に匂いと味を取り戻す。

localize.description: Sniffly是一个为因COVID-19而失去嗅觉和味觉的人提供的虚拟康复计划。该计划包括由医学专家编制的嗅觉训练练习，以及用于自我评估的嗅觉日记。
localize.tagline: 在COVID-19之后恢复你的嗅觉和味觉

localize.description: Sniffly是一個爲因COVID-19而失去嗅覺和味覺的人提供的虛擬康復計劃。該計劃包括由醫學專家編制的嗅覺訓練練習，以及用於自我評估的嗅覺日記。
localize.tagline: 在COVID-19之後恢復你的嗅覺和味覺
